symptoms.name: Skin rash
symptoms.pattern: Non-itchy, often on hands and feet

symptoms.name: Neurological symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild to severe, depending on the affected area of the nervous system

symptoms.name: Cardiovascular symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Can include aortic aneurysms, heart valve damage

symptoms.name: Other systemic symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Can include fatigue, weight loss, fever

required: Positive serological test for syphilis (e.g., VDRL, FTA-ABS)
Presence of characteristic clinical manifestations of late syphilis
supportive: Neurological examination findings consistent with neurosyphilis
Cardiovascular examination findings consistent with cardiovascular syphilis
